name: Daniel Boone Community Action Agency
description: Non-profit community action agency providing comprehensive social services including housing assistance, transportation, energy assistance (LIHEAP), child care, weatherization, workforce development, and emergency solutions grants. Serves low-income individuals and families in multiple Kentucky counties.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
eligibility_requirements: Low-income individuals and families. Specific eligibility varies by program.
populations_served: Low-income families, individuals, seniors, children, veterans
cost_information: Services provided free or on sliding scale based on income. Some programs have income eligibility requirements.
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-12-19. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://danielboonecaa.org/contact-us. Services and programs verified from main website https://danielboonecaa.org/ and programs page https://danielboonecaa.org/programs. Phone number (606) 864-9121 confirmed as London office number. Website verified current and accessible. Hours of operation confirmed from official contact page. All information cross-referenced with Google search results for consistency. Organization serves multiple counties including Clay, Jackson, Laurel, Rockcastle, Lee, Owsley, and Wolfe counties with different office locations.
